name: doc
shortDescription: Opens the official Angular Classic documentation (angular-classic.com) in a browser, and searches for a given keyword.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: keyword
options.description: The keyword to search for, as provided in the search bar in angular-classic.com.

options.name: search
options.description: Search all of angular-classic.com. Otherwise, searches only API reference documentation.

options.name: version
options.description: The version of Angular Classic to use for the documentation. If not provided, the command uses your current Angular Classic core version.
